snippet: After a failure to connect, a failure in communication by Gisele Bundchen and Brandon Jacobs.
abstract: After a failure to connect, a failure in communication by Gisele Bundchen and Brandon Jacobs.
lead_paragraph: Brian Burke, who contributes to the Fifth Down, wrote a post for the Slate/Deadspin N.F.L. Roundtable that focused on some of the biggest plays of the Super Bowl. Fans know that Wes Welker's drop on a twisting attempt at a catch was a key play. Burke gives us the nitty-gritty math on the Win Probability; it was the biggest swing in the game:

headline.main: Wes Welker's Drop, and Too Much Talk
